name: Presentation of attestation request to the user
scenarioId: android/Batch_issuance_and_processing_of_multiple_instances_of_the_same_credential_type_71/Present_an_instance_of_a_credential_relying_party_initiated_remote_same_device_160/presentAnInstanceOfACredentialRelyingPartyInitiatedRemoteSameDevice:Presentation of attestation request to the user
methodName: Presentation of attestation request to the user

testSteps.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the EUDI Wallet and the Relying Party User Interface reside on the same device
And there is an active internet connection
Given the user is successfully authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Then the EUDI Wallet informs the user that the Relying Party requests an attestation

userStory.storyName: Presentation of Batch Issued Attestations in EUDI Wallet
userStory.displayName: Presentation of Batch Issued Attestations in EUDI Wallet
userStory.narrative:
As an EUDI Wallet User,,
  I want to present attributes of a batch issued attestation to a requestor Relying Party residing on the same device as my EUDI Wallet
  so that my privacy is protected when presenting attributes from an attestation multiple times to the same Relying Party or colluding Relying Parties (Relying Party linkability)

title: Presentation of attestation request to the user
